event.descr:
The UPS output power will turn off in a number of seconds equal to upsControlOutputOffTrapDelay.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdControlOff trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS output power will turn on in a number of seconds equal to upsControlOutputOnTrapDelay.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdControlOn trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS has no AC input power and is running on battery.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOnBattery trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS batteries are low. Tied to low battery alarm condition.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdLowBattery trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Input power has been restored after running on battery.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;

event.descr:
The battery has recovered from a low battery condition.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdReturnFromLowBattery trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The ups has sensed an overload of greater than 106 percent. Tied to the 106% overload alarm.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOutputOverload trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Some component of the ups - rectifier, inverter, control panel has failed. Tied to alarms indi- cating failure.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdInternalFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The Battery Totally Discharged Alarm has occurred.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdBatteryDischarged trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The ups inverter is unavailable due to an internal failure.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdInverterFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The ups has gone on bypass for some reason.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOnBypass trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The ups bypass is unavailable

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

event.descr:
The ups input power is incorrect in voltage, frequency, or phase rotation.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdInputFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdBuildingAlarm trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

event.descr:
The ups is returned to utility power running the inverter after either a transfer to bypass or a run on battery.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOnInverter trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One of the UPS breakers or contactors has been opened.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdBreakerOpen trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An alarm not defined in the xups Well Known Alarms (eg, an alarm defined in RFC1628) has been added to the Alarm Table.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmEntryAdded trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An alarm not defined in the xups Well Known Alarms has been removed from the Alarm Table.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmEntryRemoved trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One or more batteries have been determined to require replacement.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmBatteryBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS has shutdown as requested, i.e., the output is off.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOutputOffAsRequested trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The result of the last diagnostic test indicates a failure.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdDiagnosticTestFailed trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
A problem has been encountered in the communications between the agent and the UPS.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdCommunicationsLost trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An xupsControlOutputOffDelay countdown is underway.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdUpsShutdownPending trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
A test is in progress, as initiated and indicated by the xupsTest Group. When the test is complete, one of the following traps will be sent: - xupstdDiagnosticTestFailed if the test fails, - xupstdDiagnosticTestPassed on success, or - xupstdAlarmEntryRemoved in other cases (e.g., Test Canceled).

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmTestInProgress trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The ambient temperature, xupsEnvAmbientTemp, has fallen below the set lower limit, xupsEnvAmbientLowerLimit, or has risen above the set upper limit, xupsEnvAmbientUpperLimit.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;

xupsEnvAmbientTemp %parm[#4]%;

xupsEnvAmbientLowerLimit %parm[#5]%;

xupsEnvAmbientUpperLimit %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAmbientTempBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]% xupsEnvAmbientTemp=%parm[#4]% xupsEnvAmbientLowerLimit=%parm[#5]% xupsEnvAmbientUpperLimit=%parm[#6]%

event.descr:
The Contact indicated by xupsContactIndex is in its Active state. The following are the situations that generate this trap: For xupsContactType: and xupsContactState: normallyOpen(1) and closedWithNotice(4) normallyClosed(2) and openWithNotice(3) anyChange(3) and openWithNotice(3) or closedWithNotice(4)

xupsContactIndex %parm[#1]%;

xupsContactType %parm[#2]%; normallyOpen(1) normallyClosed(2) anyChange(3) notUsed(4)

xupsContactState %parm[#3]%; open(1) closed(2) openWithNotice(3) closedWithNotice(4)

xupsContactDescr %parm[#4]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdContactActiveNotice trap received xupsContactIndex=%parm[#1]% xupsContactType=%parm[#2]% xupsContactState=%parm[#3]% xupsContactDescr=%parm[#4]%

event.descr:
The Contact indicated by xupsContactIndex has changed to its Inactive state.

xupsContactIndex %parm[#1]%;

xupsContactType %parm[#2]%; normallyOpen(1) normallyClosed(2) anyChange(3) notUsed(4)

xupsContactState %parm[#3]%; open(1) closed(2) openWithNotice(3) closedWithNotice(4)

xupsContactDescr %parm[#4]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdContactInactiveNotice trap received xupsContactIndex=%parm[#1]% xupsContactType=%parm[#2]% xupsContactState=%parm[#3]% xupsContactDescr=%parm[#4]%

event.descr:
A parallel UPS system is no longer operating in N+1 redundant mode; this may be due to module failure or removal, or due to overloading.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdLossOfRedundancy trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An internal temperature is out of tolerance.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmTempBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An uncorrected problem has been detected within the UPS charger subsystem.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmChargerFailed trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

The failure of one or more fans in the UPS has been detected.

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmFanFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The failure of one or more fuses has been detected.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAlarmFuseFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
A Relay, Contactor, or Breaker has failed.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdPowerSwitchBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
One module in a parallel or composite system has failed.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdModuleFailure trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The system is being powered by its Alternate Power Source, such as a Secondary utility feed (on a dual AC input UPS), generator, flywheel, or fuel cell.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;

xupsInputSource %parm[#4]%; other(1) none(2) primaryUtility(3) bypassFeed(4) secondaryUtility(5) generator(6) flywheel(7) fuelcell(8)
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOnAlternatePowerSource trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]% xupsInputSource=%parm[#4]%

event.descr:
On systems with a separate alternate power source (eg, dual AC inputs), that alternate power source is currently not available. This could be a problem if the primary power source (eg, utility) fails for a period of time longer than that for which the internal batteries can supply power.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAltPowerNotAvailable trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
Some Notice condition exists which is not covered by the other traps. This is like an xupstdInternalFailure, but at a lower severity level.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdNoticeCondition trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The remote temperature, xupsEnvRemoteTemp, has fallen below the set lower limit, xupsEnvRemoteTempLowerLimit, or has risen above the set upper limit, xupsEnvRemoteTempUpperLimit.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;

xupsEnvRemoteTemp %parm[#4]%;

xupsEnvRemoteTempLowerLimit %parm[#5]%;

xupsEnvRemoteTempUpperLimit %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdRemoteTempBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]% xupsEnvRemoteTemp=%parm[#4]% xupsEnvRemoteTempLowerLimit=%parm[#5]% xupsEnvRemoteTempUpperLimit=%parm[#6]%

event.descr:
The remote temperature, xupsEnvRemoteHumidity, has fallen below the set lower limit, xupsEnvRemoteHumidityLowerLimit, or has risen above the set upper limit, xupsEnvRemoteHumidityUpperLimit.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;

xupsEnvRemoteHumidity %parm[#4]%;

xupsEnvRemoteHumidityLowerLimit %parm[#5]%;

xupsEnvRemoteHumidityUpperLimit %parm[#6]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdRemoteHumidityBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]% xupsEnvRemoteHumidity=%parm[#4]% xupsEnvRemoteHumidityLowerLimit=%parm[#5]% xupsEnvRemoteHumidityUpperLimit=%parm[#6]%

event.descr:
A periodic status trap message. It is sent at an interval set by object xupsHeartbeatMinsInterval. The included variables provide a brief statement of the UPS status.

xupsInputSource %parm[#1]%; other(1) none(2) primaryUtility(3) bypassFeed(4) secondaryUtility(5) generator(6) flywheel(7) fuelcell(8)

xupsOutputSource %parm[#2]%; other(1) none(2) normal(3) bypass(4) battery(5) booster(6) reducer(7) parallelCapacity(8) parallelRedundant(9) highEfficiencyMode(10) maintenanceBypass(11)

xupsAlarms %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdHeartbeat trap received xupsInputSource=%parm[#1]% xupsOutputSource=%parm[#2]% xupsAlarms=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
A diagnostic test just completed, and its result is Passed. The included variables provide additional information on the test.

xupsTestBatteryStatus %parm[#1]%; unknown(1) passed(2) failed(3) inProgress(4) notSupported(5) inhibited(6) scheduled(7)

xupsLastGeneralTest %parm[#2]%; noTestStarted(2) testSystem(3) testSecondarySource(4) flashLightsTest(5)

xupsLastGeneralTestResult %parm[#3]%; unknown(1) passed(2) failed(3) inProgress(4) notSupported(5) inhibited(6) scheduled(7)
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdDiagnosticTestPassed trap received xupsTestBatteryStatus=%parm[#1]% xupsLastGeneralTest=%parm[#2]% xupsLastGeneralTestResult=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The output condition (other than OutputOverload) is out of tolerance.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOutputBad trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS output is off and the UPS is awaiting the return of input power.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdAwaitingPower trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
The UPS has been placed on Maintenance / Manual Bypass by an operator.

xupsAlarmID %parm[#1]%;

xupsAlarmDescr %parm[#2]%;

xupsTrapMessage %parm[#3]%;
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: xupstdOnMaintenanceBypass trap received xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%

event.descr:
An event was received with the Exide (APC) enterprise ID, but no configuration exists for this event in eventconf.xml.

(enterprise:%id% generic:%generic% specific:%specific%). %parm[##]%
event.logmsg: APC XUPS Event: Generic Unknown Event xupsAlarmID=%parm[#1]% xupsAlarmDescr=%parm[#2]% xupsTrapMessage=%parm[#3]%
